channel.title: COMPILER ERROR help!
channel.description:
when i try to compile it says this [code]server.java:47: illegal start of type public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ server.java:47: illegal start of expression public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any help would be [b][size=14pt][font=arial]VERY[/font][/size][/b] Appreciated!!

item.title: COMPILER ERROR help!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“sorecheeny, post:1, topic:393263”]when i try to compile it says this
server.java:47: illegal start of type public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ server.java:47: illegal start of expression public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Any help would be [size=14pt][font=arial]VERY[/font][/size] Appreciated!![/quote]
were it says

In server.java add // before 43594=default, this will mark them out and make everything work fine, or just removed 43594=default if you don’t need to remember that note.

Read full topic
